SELECT sc.comment_id AS commentSelectId, sc.comment_content as commentSelectContent, sc.comment_author as commentSelectAuthor, sc.comment_date as commentSelectDate, sc.comment_content_id as commentSelectContentId, hc.likeCount, (SELECT count(*) FROM heart WHERE commentSelectId = sc.comment_id AND nowUserName = #{username}) as myLike-- 내가 좋아요를 눌렀는지. 눌렀으면 1, 안눌렀으면 0 FROM stockcomment sc LEFT JOIN ( SELECT commentSelectId, COUNT(*) AS likeCount FROM heart GROUP BY commentSelectId ) hc ON sc.comment_id = hc.commentSelectId WHERE sc.comment_content_id = #{idValue}
LIMIT #{offset}, 5
